_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Velocity
author: parker@parkervcp.com
description: Velocity is a Minecraft server proxy with unparalleled server support, scalability, and flexibility.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Velocity Proxy Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
PROJECT="velocity"
USER_AGENT="pterodactyl-installer/1.0"

# Handle variables
if [[ -z "${VELOCITY_VERSION}" ]] || [[ "${VELOCITY_VERSION}" == "latest" ]]; then
    VELOCITY_VERSION=""
fi

cd /mnt/server

# Check for manual download URL
if [[ -n "${DL_PATH}" ]]; then
    echo -e "Using supplied download url: ${DL_PATH}"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(eval echo $(echo ${DL_PATH} | sed -e 's/{{/${/g' -e 's/}}/}/g'))
else
    # API Logic (fill.papermc.io)
    
    # 1. Resolve Version if missing
    if [[ -z "${VELOCITY_VERSION}" ]]; then
        echo "Resolving latest version for ${PROJECT}..."
        VERSIONS=$(curl -s -H "User-Agent: ${USER_AGENT}" https://fill.papermc.io/v3/projects/${PROJECT} | \
            jq -r '.versions | to_entries[] | .value[]' | \
            sort -V -r)
            
        for VERSION in $VERSIONS; do
            VELOCITY_VERSION=$VERSION
            break
        done
    fi
    
    echo "Target Version: ${VELOCITY_VERSION}"
    
    # 2. Resolve Build/Download URL
    # We fetch builds for the version
    BUILDS_RESPONSE=$(curl -s -H "User-Agent: ${USER_AGENT}" https://fill.papermc.io/v3/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${VELOCITY_VERSION}/builds)
    
    if echo "$BUILDS_RESPONSE" | jq -e '.ok == false' > /dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo "Error: $(echo "$BUILDS_RESPONSE" | jq -r '.message // "Unknown error"')"
        exit 1
    fi

    # Find the URL.
    # Priority: STABLE channel -> Then any channel (fallback for dev builds)
    # Key: 'application' (Velocity) -> 'server:default' (Paper fallback)
    PAPERMC_URL=$(echo "$BUILDS_RESPONSE" | jq -r 'first(.[] | select(.channel == "STABLE") | .downloads["application"].url // .downloads["server:default"].url) // first(.[] | .downloads["application"].url // .downloads["server:default"].url) // "null"')

    if [[ "$PAPERMC_URL" != "null" ]]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$PAPERMC_URL
    else
        echo "No valid builds found for version ${VELOCITY_VERSION}"
        exit 1
    fi
fi

# Download and Install
if [[ -f ${SERVER_JARFILE} ]]; then
    mv ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${SERVER_JARFILE}.old
fi

echo -e "Running curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}

# Configuration
if [[ -f velocity.toml ]]; then
    echo -e "velocity config file exists"
else
    echo -e "downloading velocity config file."
    curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/game_eggs/minecraft/proxy/java/velocity/velocity.toml -o velocity.toml
fi

# Secret
if [[ -f forwarding.secret ]]; then
    echo -e "velocity forwarding secret file already exists"
else
    echo -e "creating forwarding secret file"
    touch forwarding.secret
    date +%s | sha256sum | base64 | head -c 12 > forwarding.secret
fi

echo -e "install complete"

variables.name: Velocity Version
variables.description:
The Velocity Proxy version to download.

Set to 'latest ' the download the last stable build.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description:
Server Jarfile, by default this is set to 'velocity.jar'.
Set it to otherwise if you wish to have a different jarfile name.

variables.name: Download Path
variables.description: A URL to use to download a server.jar rather than the ones in the install script. This is not user viewable.

variables.name: Build Number
variables.description:
The build number for the velocity release.

Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.
